name: CalmVille
description:
Thank you for playing!
This game was created for the GDEX - Game Jam.

Brought to you by www.creativeVein.studio
Social: @CveinStudio

-- CONCEPT --

The Island of CALMVILLE is in dire need of help from the HappyFetchyServices team.  Do your best to assist them and help them be calm.;

Enjoy the island with peculiar individuals and some.. random ones.

Do what you can to help out the citizen and once you've completed your goal, you may return back to the office with the great news and a JOB WELL DONE!
Cheers!

NOTE: There are a few bug as far as completing your quest goals too quickly. SORRY! (You can try and continue the rest of the quests, there are 5 in total.
Also - The dialogue may seem like it finishes at times, but it can have additional context that can be ACCIDENTALLY SKIPPED if you press E too fast/much. -- CONTROLS --
  • Movement:  ASWD keys
  • Interaction:  "E"   key
  • Journal/Inventory: "J" key
